item.title: This Guy Attached 21 Chef’s Knives to a Slicing Robot Arm to Determine Which One Is Best
item.description: Certified kitchen knife nerd Scott Heimendinger used a robot arm on multiple chef’s knives to collect 100,000 data points about which blades cut most efficiently. He’s ranked them from best to worst.
